Name: Wheat
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food.

Name: Rice
Effect: Every 4 spins: +10 Food.

Name: Cattle
Effect: Every spin: +1 Food. +2 Food per adjacent Cattle.

Name: Banana
Effect: Every spin: +3 Food. Destroyed after 6 spins.

Name: Fish
Effect: Every spin: +1 Food. +3 Food if adjacent to Coast.

Name: Coast
Effect: Every spin: +1 Food. +1 Gold per adjacent Coast.

Name: Stone
Effect: Every spin: +1 Food, +1 Gold.

Name: Copper
Effect: Every spin: +2 Gold. If exactly 3 Copper on the board: all Copper produce x3.

Name: Granary
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food. Adjacent Wheat and Rice produce double.

Name: Monument
Effect: Every spin: +1 Knowledge.

Name: Oasis
Effect: Every spin: +3 Food. +2 Food per adjacent empty slot.

Name: Shrine
Effect: Every spin: +1 Food. +2 Food if adjacent to any Religion symbol.

Name: Plantation
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food. If adjacent to Banana: +4 Food and Banana's destroy timer resets.

Name: Pasture
Effect: Every spin: +1 Food. Adjacent Cattle and Horse produce +2 extra Food.

Name: Quarry
Effect: Every spin: +1 Food. If adjacent to Stone: +3 Gold. If adjacent to Copper: +2 Gold.

Name: Totem
Effect: Every spin: +1 Food per Religion symbol anywhere on the board.

Name: Offering
Effect: Every spin: -5 Food, +3 Knowledge.

Name: Omen
Effect: Every spin: 50% chance +5 Food, 50% chance -3 Food.

Name: Campfire
Effect: Every spin: +1 Food. After 10 spins: destroyed and adjacent symbols produce double food this spin.

Name: Pottery
Effect: Every spin: stores +2 Food internally (shown on counter). On destroy: releases stored Food x2.

Name: Tribal Village
Effect: After 1 spin: immediately adds 2 random Ancient symbols. Then destroys self.

Name: Horse
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food, +1 Gold.

Name: Iron
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food, +2 Gold.

Name: Galley
Effect: Every spin: +2 Gold. +2 Food per adjacent Coast. Every 8 spins: adds a random ancient symbol.

Name: Library
Effect: Every spin: +2 Knowledge. +2 Knowledge if adjacent to Scroll.

Name: Scroll
Effect: Every spin: +1 Knowledge. +1 Knowledge per adjacent symbol that produces Knowledge.

Name: Market
Effect: Every spin: +1 Gold per adjacent symbol.

Name: Tax Collector
Effect: Every spin: +3 Gold. Adjacent symbols produce -1 Food this spin.

Name: Forge
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food, +1 Gold. If adjacent to Copper or Iron: +4 Gold. If adjacent to Stone: +2 Food.

Name: Arena
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food. Whenever any symbol is destroyed this spin: +4 Food, +2 Gold.

Name: Christianity
Effect: Produce Food equal to the adjacent symbol with highest Food produced. Adjacent to a Religion symbol: -50 Food.

Name: Islam
Effect: Gains 3x Gold for sum of all adjacent Knowledge produced. Adjacent to a Religion symbol: -50 Food.

Name: Buddhism
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food for every empty slots. Adjacent to a Religion symbol: -50 Food.

Name: Hinduism
Effect: When an adjacent symbol is destroyed: +5 Knowledge and adds the same symbol. Adjacent to a Religion symbol: -50 Food.

Name: Barbarian
Effect: Every spin: 50% chance -3 food, 50% chance -1 gold.

Name: Warrior
Effect: Every 10 spin: -3 food

Name: Scout
Effect: Every spin: +1 Food, +1 Knowledge. Every 8 spins: adds a random Era 1 symbol to your collection.

Name: Settler
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food. After 12 spins: destroyed and replaced by City.

Name: Swordsman
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food. Destroys adjacent Barbarian. +12 Food per Barbarian destroyed. Attacks twice.

Name: Colosseum
Effect: Every spin: +3 Food. If adjacent to Warrior or Swordsman: +4 Food extra. -2 Food per adjacent empty slot.

Name: Siege Tower
Effect: Every spin: +2 Food. If adjacent to a symbol that produces 0 or negative Food: destroys it and gives +15 Food.
